        • SSHUtil getInitialise()

          0.10 introduces initialise which simplifies and wraps requirements in SSHUtil class with initialise connection, SCPClient and SFTPv3Client are all initiated

          Returns:

        • ch.ethz.ssh2.Connection getOpenConnection()

          runs default no host no port which finds as per configuration file or defaults

          Returns:
          sh2 Connection for reuse if you have ran intialise no need to run this

        • ch.ethz.ssh2.Connection openConnection(java.lang.String host = null, int port = 0)

          returns:
          a ssh2 Connection for reuse
          Parameters:
          host - - optional
          port - - optional Returns a default connection bound to local host It can be called as // this binds to HOST config or localhost // then binds config ports key/pass password username etc sshUtilService.openConnection or sshUtilService.getOpenConnection("10.0.0.1") //defaults port to PORT config or 22 or sshUtilService.getOpenConnection("10.0.0.1",32) //where it connects to 10.0.0.1 on port 32
